amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funding to award any new allocations under the market access program or pay salaries of personnel to award such allocations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 51 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit new allocations under the Market Access Program (MAP).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 301 (Roll no. 376).
